title: Introduction
description: [Character 3] has arrived to the Hamlet, by the Caretaker's stagecoach along the southwestern 'old road', by other means, or simply showing up, and now stands before its Margrave ([Character 1]) and Bursar ([Character 2]) in the strategy room, surrounded by maps of corrupted territories. The two introduce themselves and ask [Character 3] about their background and motivations.
